home.register: Don't have an account? Register here.

instructions.title: WIQ Instructions
instructions.objective_p1: The objective of the game is to answer as many questions correctly as possible.
instructions.how_to_play_p1: The game consists of a series of questions.
instructions.how_to_play_p3: Choose the correct answer from the options provided.
instructions.how_to_play_p4: Click or tap on your selected answer to submit it.
instructions.scoring_p1: Each correct answer earns you x points.
instructions.scoring_p2: Incorrect answers do not deduct points.
instructions.time_limit_p1: Some game modes may have a time limit for answering each question. Be quick and accurate to maximize your score.
instructions.have_fun_p1: Enjoy the game and test your knowledge. Good luck!
